documentation.description: Returns one or more component templates

name.description: The comma separated names of the component templates

master_timeout.description: Explicit operation timeout for connection to master node

deprecated.description: To support inclusive language, use 'cluster_manager_timeout' instead.

cluster_manager_timeout.description: Explicit operation timeout for connection to cluster-manager node

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)
